title: Caribbean Pools Website & E-Commerce Platform
tagline: Complete digital transformation from legacy website to modern e-commerce ecosystem

hero.alt: Caribbean Pools website and e-commerce platform

context.problem: Legacy website failed to communicate process clarity and craftsmanship, while all retail sales were handled manually by phone or paper forms. This created conversion issues, seasonal bottlenecks, and missed revenue opportunities.
constraints: Must integrate with existing service CRM and inventory
Need to digitize complex Early Buy program logic
Support seasonal content updates and promotions
Mobile-first for on-site consultations and customer ordering
context.quote: Show the journey, not just the product. Let customers order when it's convenient for them.

solution.approach: Complete digital ecosystem redesign combining responsive WordPress architecture with WooCommerce e-commerce. Integrated process storytelling, custom lifecycle illustrations, Early Buy program automation, and seamless CRM connectivity.
bullets: Comprehensive sitemap, wireframes, and information architecture
Custom pool lifecycle illustrations and process infographics
Modular WordPress CMS with custom blocks for content flexibility
ShopCaribbeanPools.com e-commerce platform with Early Buy logic
Bi-directional Jobber CRM and inventory integration
Automated email marketing and promotional workflows

gallery.alt: Homepage design with pool lifecycle storytelling
Custom process infographic and service visualization

process.title: Research & Discovery
process.description: Customer interviews, sales process mapping, competitor analysis, and journey mapping

process.title: Information Architecture
process.description: Site structure, navigation design, and low-fidelity wireframes for both platforms

process.title: Visual Design
process.description: High-fidelity mockups, custom pool lifecycle illustrations, and brand application

process.title: WordPress Development
process.description: Custom theme build, modular content blocks, and responsive templates

process.title: E-Commerce Build
process.description: WooCommerce platform, Early Buy program logic, and mobile checkout optimization

process.title: Integration
process.description: Jobber CRM sync, inventory management, payment processing, and email automation

process.title: Testing & QA
process.description: User testing, checkout flow optimization, and cross-device compatibility

process.title: Launch & Training
process.description: Deploy platforms, train team, and establish content workflows

process.title: Optimization
process.description: Monitor analytics, iterate on UX, and refine promotional strategies

reflection.learning: Visual storytelling builds trust and educates before asking for the sale. E-commerce success requires removing friction and meeting customers where they are—whether that's researching services or buying supplies at 2 AM.
reuse: Process visualization and lifecycle storytelling patterns
Mobile-first content blocks and responsive templates
